text: Anna stands holding the book The Circle. She is wearing a black short sleeved dress.

🪞 BOOK REVIEW 🪞

The Circle by Stephen J. Galgon
☁️ Genre: Action 💥 Thriller 🔪
☁️ My Rating: 💎💎💎💎💎

💬 My Thoughts

Excuse me while I pick my jaw up off the floor... This book is INCREDIBLE.  Dare I say, this might be one of my new all time favorite books.

I was contacted by the author for a review copy a couple weeks after coming across his book and adding it to my "want to read" list so I was super excited to receive a copy.  As soon I got it, I pushed it to the top of my TBR and ended up finishing it in about 6 hours.  When I say I couldn't put this book down, I mean I stayed up late on a work night reading and then woke up early before work to read some more.  I will now be making my husband read this next.

The suspense in this writing is unmatched.  The story is genius.  The fast pace of the book is absolutely perfect.  I will be recommending this one to literally anyone that will listen and I cannot wait for some of my booksta friends to get their hands on a copy.

If you like thrillers, action, suspense, secret societies 🤫🤭, then this is one of your future favorites right here.

Thank you SO much, Stephen, for sending me this book.  I will probably be re-reading it at least once a year 😂

#TheCircleIsReal #TheCircleBook @TheCircleIsReal

..
QOTD:  Tell me about a book that totally blew your mind?! 🗣

THE CIRCLE by Stephen J. Galgon ⭕️ 

Thank you to the author @thecircleisreal for the gifted review copy!

💭 What would you do for all the money and power in the world?

Doug Goodwin lived an average life until he was recruited to join The Circle, a secret society whose members hunt each other for sport. 

I branched out of my comfort zone with the action thriller. The story was fast-paced and exciting, and I was horrified by the moral dilemmas. This book offers some interesting social commentary on the rich, elite echelons of society. The premise is just wild enough to seem plausible.

However, I think this genre is ultimately not for me. Character depth and development often took a backseat to the action and conspiracy. If you’re a fan of action movies, I think you’ll enjoy this book!

…
#thecirclebook #thecircleisreal #stephenjgalgon #thrillerbook #thrillerbooks #actionthriller #indiebook #bookreview #bookreviewer #mjepublishing

Happy Weekend Everyone! 🎃✨

I hope everyone is having a magical weekend so far, wherever in the wide world you happen to be.

This bookstack was a lot of fun to make but it is all over the place. Some tbrs, some 5⭐, one meh. And then there's The Circle…

The Circle really did a number on me. I watched the movie with Emma Watson and was really intrigued so I picked up the book. That was back in 2019. I still can't decide if reading it was a mistake or not. It wasn't bad, I just wasn't ready for how it made me feel, and how much I was going to think about it afterwards. I think I was in a semi-state of shock. If you've read it, shoot me a message. I would love to chat about it.

What's a book you've read that really challenged you mentally/emotionally?
.
.

🔵 IT’S HERE! 🔵

Everyone stop what you’re doing.  Legends of the Circle is in my hands.

I have been so incredibly excited to get my copy of this 🥳

As most of you know, The Circle was one of my absolute favorite books of 2021 and I post about it pretty often.  This is book 2, #LegendsOfTheCircle

If you haven’t read The Circle, now is the perfect time to grab both and binge them together!

I cannot wait to dive back into this world.  Review to come!

JANUARY READS 📚

In January I finished 17 books, including 7 physical books, 4 ebooks, and 6 audiobooks (technically I finished one of these February 1, but it’s a library book, so I didn’t want to hold it hostage all month)! 2022 is off to a great start (at least when it comes to reading), with a probably record breaking number of 5⭐️ books this month!

📖 Lore Olympus: Volume One by Rachel Smythe
📖 Daughter of the Moon Goddess by Sue Lynn Tan
Heartstopper, Volume Two by Alice Oseman
📖 Till We Have Faces by C.S. Lewis
📖 They Never Learn by Layne Fargo
📖 The Circle by Stephen J. Galgon
📖 Call Us What We Carry by Amanda Gorman
📱 When You Get the Chance by Emma Lord
📱 The Monarchs by Kass Morgan & Danielle Paige
📱 Weather Girl by Rachel Lynn Solomon
📱 Katmere Academy: An Insider’s Guide by Tracy Wolff
🎧 The Shadow Rising by Robert Jordan
🎧 House of Earth and Blood by Sarah J. Maas
🎧 The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet by Becky Chambers
🎧 Memento by Amie Kaufman & Jay Kristoff
🎧 The Anthropocene Reviewed by John Green
🎧 The Fastest Way to Fall by Denise Williams

Il 29 marzo Lucia Rosin e Andrea Venier di OFFICINA+39 presenteranno l'ultima edizione di THE CIRCLE BOOK in una video intervista con Francesca Rulli per 4sustainability:
"Il modo innovativo con cui è stato concepito e modellato per generare soluzioni vantaggiose per mills e marchi. La trasparenza è alla base dell'intero progetto, a partire dall'idea creativa, sulle fibre e sui tessuti, fino alle rifiniture e ai capi finali. Puntiamo, attraverso queste azioni condivise, a tracciare un nuovo percorso formativo per le future generazioni di designer consapevoli. Offriamo apertura di conoscenza per contribuire a un nuovo modello di moda creativo e sostenibile basato su collaborazioni e sinergie."

Vi invitiamo a partecipare ed a scoprire il ricco programma di incontri dedicati all'innovazione nell'industria del Fashion a questo link: https://www.4sustainability.it/francesca-rulli/

"Collaborazione e Circolarità sono le prossime frontiere nella trasformazione del tessile e della moda."

#thecirclebook
#modasostenibilegarantita #sustainabilityheroes @tencel_global @officina39 @bluegardener

Imagine if you had all the money you ever wanted at the push of a button…the power to control law enforcement, politicians at the highest levels, the judicial system as a whole. To have what you want when you want it, whatever it is. All you have to do is kill someone . . . before someone kills you. NOW imagine if that concept was captured eloquently in a series of novels, AND the author was joining the Bros. Rivera this week! AAWA all three recount their recent Red Bank adventures with Jay & Silent Bob, then your terrific trio head to Springfield USA and pile on to the couch with the Simpson clan! Nootch🇺🇸(Ep link in bio)

THE CIRCLE BOOK 3: SEE THE COLLECTION

The Circle Book is back for its third year. This collaborative project was launched by Lenzing, Meidea and Officina+39 in 2020 to rethink circular design and creation, acting as an example of what is possible in sustainable apparel when companies work together, bringing us as industry stakeholders together!

We're proud to be a part of this circular move and we are even more excited for all holistic projects to move the industry forward!

CIRCLE BOOK 3: SEE THE COLLECTION

The Circle Book is back for its third year. This collaborative project was launched by Lenzing, Meidea and Officina+39 in 2020 to rethink circular design and creation, acting as an example of what is possible in sustainable apparel when companies work together.

In a circular move, one goal of this year’s collection was to reduce waste. Thinking beyond material or resource waste, the process was optimized via technology to cut out excess time and energy.

Come and say hello during @kingpins_show Amsterdam, we have a dedicated space to present this collaborative initiative on the top level floor and the TENCEL™ booth.

Order the CIRCLE BOOK 3 now, the link is in our bio.

@meidea.atelier @officina39 @tencel_usa @carvedinblue @ecovero_global @CalikDenim @crafil_sewing_thread @bluematters_official @globaldenim_ @nexgenpackaging @tejidosroyo @tyhtekstil @teeshare @ren_collective @luciachain_official @apxbranding 4sustainability @francescarulli_official

CIRCLE BOOK 3 |  ACT TOGETHER

In its third year, The Circle Book, a collaborative project launched by Lenzing, Meidea, and Officina +39 welcomed 10 brand partners and multiple designers to jointly develop a collection that is circular and sustainable.

The Circle Book is truly a collaborative effort, it shows what can be accomplished when every company involved with production and development acts in unison.

Come and say hello during @kingpins_show Amsterdam, we have a dedicated space to present this collaborative initiative on the top level floor and the TENCEL™ booth.

Pre-order the CIRCLE BOOK 3 now, the link is in our bio.

It's #GiveawayTime, and a #ThrillerThursday to boot. That's right. I'm celebrating. Thanks to the talented @pboylan_official, Legends is out now on #Audible! So I'm doing what any normal person does when he starts selling something new, I'm giving it away for free! 

5 lucky winners will receive Audible promo codes for BOTH #TheCircleBook and #LegendsOfTheCircle! 

AND

I'll personally send you some Circle swag, including an autographed author plate!

All you have to do to enter is:

1) Follow me. No follows and unfollows please. 

2) Like and save this post. 

3) Tag 2 friends who you think would like to enter (unlimited). 

That's it!
For extra entry you can 
⚫️ Share this post (and tag me so i know) every 24 hours. 
⚪️ Follow my friends at @uscomicshq (come back here and drop a 🤘 when you do.) 10 extra entries if you tuned in on Wednesday and can tell me in a DM what my default favorite Simpsons episode is!
🔵 Skate any of my previous posts or reels to your stories (don't forget to tag me so i know).

Contest ends Monday, August 22 at 11:59 PM EST -- My birthday! (Share a birthday wish to your story on Monday for another entry. 😉)

Not affiliated with Instagram. Good luck everyone!
